text: Derek John Lawrence (16 November 1941 â€“ 13 May 2020) Andy Powell, Facebook, 14 May 2020 was an English record producer. He was famous for his work for Joe Meek's Outlaws, Deep Purple, Flash, Machiavel and Wishbone Ash. Lawrence died on 13 May 2020 in Peterborough, England at the age of 78. ==References== Category:1941 births Category:2020 deaths Category:English record producers Category:Musicians from London Category:Businesspeople from London
title: Derek Lawrence
